name: Solidarity Forever
description:
1 Song 300,000 Different Ways to Play It

Solidarity Forever is an interactive music box based on the popular folk melody used for songs like "John Brown's Body," "Battle Hymn of the Republic," "On Canaan's Happy Shore," and "Solidarity Forever."

All images are from the public domain, and all sounds are based on public domain melodies and lyrics.

This project is dedicated to all the AAA and Prestige Indie games with boring, polished folk music. u kno which ones i mean ;-)

(Created with Ren'Py for NaNoRenO 2022)
